member.name: T:My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:MIDAS.Proxies.EnterpriseServiceClient.GetIDNumsNoCache(System.Object,MIDAS.Entities.IDNumMatch,MIDAS.Entities.IDNumFilter)
member.summary: This function will return a list of IDNums based on a search criteria directly from the database instead of using the IDNum cache. (Live Data)
member.param: Single string or number entry for what you want to search on
Enumerated category for what you want to search on
Enumerated filter for your return set - All or Active
member.returns: Returns a list of IDNum objects

member.name: M:MIDAS.Proxies.EnterpriseServiceClient.SaveMidasActivityLog(MIDAS.Entities.MIDASAction@)
member.summary: This sub will save the MIDAS Activity object to the CLNEMRESQLDBP01 database. Use the MIDAS.Entities.MIDASAction object for activity values
member.param: MIDAS.Entities.MIDASAction object to be saved. Create the new object and add the values as relevent
